mapper.select: select s1.roleUuid, s1.roleName, s1.createTime, s1.updateTime, s3.userUuid, s3.username from sys_role s1 inner join sys_user_role_rel s2 on s2.roleUuid = s1.roleUuid inner join sys_user s3 on s3.userUuid = s2.userUuid where s3.userUuid = #{userUuid}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_role (roleUuid, roleName, createTime) values (#{roleUuid}, #{roleName}, #{createTime})
